amendment.description: To affirm a Federal commitment to carbon capture utilization and storage research, development, and implementation and to study the costs and benefits of contracting authority for price stabilization.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3174 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3174 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S482-484; text: CR S483) To affirm a Federal commitment to carbon capture utilization and storage research, development, and implementation and to study the costs and benefits of contracting authority for price stabilization.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3174 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3174 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 2953.
